game.name: THE VIG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Infiltrate a traitor's empire as "Xie En." A surgical urban hunt, a high-IQ revenge thriller. Return as "Wu Wei," walking the line between light and dark. Choose love or vengeance? Forgive, or escape with the "blood money"? Your choices dictate the ending. This deadly game awaits your move.
